#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	
	int t,N ,sum,i;
	char a[7];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",a);
		N=strlen(a);
		if(!(a[N-1]%2)) printf("YES\n");
		else 
		{ for(i=0,sum=0;i<N;i++) sum+=(a[i]-'0');
			if(!(sum%3)) printf("YES\n");
			else printf("NO\n");
	}
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
